Go to<S>33</S> now<S>3568</S>, ye rich men<S>4145</S>, weep<S>2799</S> and howl<S>3649</S> for<S>1909</S> your<S>5216</S> miseries<S>5004</S> that shall come upon<S>1904</S> you.
Your<S>5216</S> riches<S>4149</S> are corrupted<S>4595</S>, and<S>2532</S> your<S>5216</S> garments<S>2440</S> are<S>1096</S> motheaten<S>4598</S>.
Your<S>5216</S> gold<S>5557</S> and<S>2532</S> silver<S>696</S> is cankered<S>2728</S>; and<S>2532</S> the rust<S>2447</S> of them<S>846</S> shall be<S>2071</S> a witness<S>3142</S> against<S>1519</S> you<S>5213</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall eat<S>5315</S> your<S>5216</S> flesh<S>4561</S> as it were<S>5613</S> fire<S>4442</S>. Ye have heaped treasure together<S>2343</S> for<S>1722</S> the last<S>2078</S> days<S>2250</S>.
Behold<S>2400</S>, the hire<S>3408</S> of the labourers<S>2040</S> who<S>3588</S> have reaped down<S>270</S> your<S>5216</S> fields<S>5561</S>, which<S>3588</S> is of<S>575</S> you<S>5216</S> kept back by fraud<S>650</S>, crieth<S>2896</S>: and<S>2532</S> the cries<S>995</S> of them which have reaped<S>2325</S> are entered<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the ears<S>3775</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S> of sabaoth<S>4519</S>.
Ye have lived in pleasure<S>5171</S> on<S>1909</S> the earth<S>1093</S>, and<S>2532</S> been wanton<S>4684</S>; ye have nourished<S>5142</S> your<S>5216</S> hearts<S>2588</S>, as<S>5613</S> in<S>1722</S> a day<S>2250</S> of slaughter<S>4967</S>.
Ye have condemned<S>2613</S> and killed<S>5407</S> the just<S>1342</S>; and he doth<S>498</S> not<S>3756</S> resist<S>498</S> you<S>5213</S>.
Be patient<S>3114</S> therefore<S>3767</S>, brethren<S>80</S>, unto<S>2193</S> the coming<S>3952</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S>. Behold<S>2400</S>, the husbandman<S>1092</S> waiteth<S>1551</S> for the precious<S>5093</S> fruit<S>2590</S> of the earth<S>1093</S>, and hath long patience<S>3114</S> for<S>1909</S> it<S>846</S>, until<S>2193</S> <S>302</S> he receive<S>2983</S> the early<S>4406</S> and<S>2532</S> latter<S>3797</S> rain<S>5205</S>. <sup>Be: or, Be long patient, or, Suffer with long patience</sup>
Be<S>3114</S> ye<S>5210</S> also<S>2532</S> patient<S>3114</S>; stablish<S>4741</S> your<S>5216</S> hearts<S>2588</S>: for<S>3754</S> the coming<S>3952</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S> draweth nigh<S>1448</S>.
Grudge<S>4727</S> not<S>3361</S> one against another<S>2596</S> <S>240</S>, brethren<S>80</S>, lest<S>3363</S> ye be condemned<S>2632</S>: behold<S>2400</S>, the judge<S>2923</S> standeth<S>2476</S> before<S>4253</S> the door<S>2374</S>. <sup>Grudge not: or, Groan, or, Grieve not</sup>
Take<S>2983</S>, my<S>3450</S> brethren<S>80</S>, the prophets<S>4396</S>, who<S>3739</S> have spoken<S>2980</S> in the name<S>3686</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S>, for an example<S>5262</S> of suffering affliction<S>2552</S>, and<S>2532</S> of patience<S>3115</S>.
Behold<S>2400</S>, we count them happy<S>3106</S> which endure<S>5278</S>. Ye have heard<S>191</S> of the patience<S>5281</S> of Job<S>2492</S>, and<S>2532</S> have seen<S>1492</S> the end<S>5056</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S>; that<S>3754</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> is<S>2076</S> very pitiful<S>4184</S>, and<S>2532</S> of tender mercy<S>3629</S>.
But<S>1161</S> above<S>4253</S> all things<S>3956</S>, my<S>3450</S> brethren<S>80</S>, swear<S>3660</S> not<S>3361</S>, neither<S>3383</S> by heaven<S>3772</S>, neither<S>3383</S> by the earth<S>1093</S>, neither<S>3383</S> by any<S>5100</S> other<S>243</S> oath<S>3727</S>: but<S>1161</S> let<S>2277</S> your<S>5216</S> yea<S>3483</S> be<S>2277</S> yea<S>3483</S>; and<S>2532</S> your nay<S>3756</S>, nay<S>3756</S>; lest<S>3363</S> ye fall<S>4098</S> into<S>1519</S> condemnation<S>5272</S>.
Is<S>2553</S> any<S>5100</S> among<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S> afflicted<S>2553</S>? let him pray<S>4336</S>. Is<S>2114</S> any<S>5100</S> merry<S>2114</S>? let him sing psalms<S>5567</S>.
Is<S>770</S> any<S>5100</S> sick<S>770</S> among<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S>? let him call<S>4341</S> for the elders<S>4245</S> of the church<S>1577</S>; and<S>2532</S> let them pray<S>4336</S> over<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S>, anointing<S>218</S> him<S>846</S> with oil<S>1637</S> in<S>1722</S> the name<S>3686</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S>:
And<S>2532</S> the prayer<S>2171</S> of faith<S>4102</S> shall save<S>4982</S> the sick<S>2577</S>, and<S>2532</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> shall raise<S>1453</S> him<S>846</S> up<S>1453</S>; and if<S>2579</S> he have<S>5600</S> committed<S>4160</S> sins<S>266</S>, they shall be forgiven<S>863</S> him<S>846</S>.
Confess<S>1843</S> your faults<S>3900</S> one to another<S>240</S>, and<S>2532</S> pray<S>2172</S> one<S>240</S> for<S>5228</S> another<S>240</S>, that<S>3704</S> ye may be healed<S>2390</S>. The effectual fervent<S>1754</S> prayer<S>1162</S> of a righteous man<S>1342</S> availeth<S>2480</S> much<S>4183</S>.
Elias<S>2243</S> was<S>2258</S> a man<S>444</S> subject to like passions as<S>3663</S> we are<S>2254</S>, and<S>2532</S> he prayed<S>4336</S> earnestly<S>4335</S> that it might<S>1026</S> not<S>3361</S> rain<S>1026</S>: and<S>2532</S> it rained<S>1026</S> not<S>3756</S> on<S>1909</S> the earth<S>1093</S> by the space of three<S>5140</S> years<S>1763</S> and<S>2532</S> six<S>1803</S> months<S>3376</S>. <sup>subject: of the same nature, that is, a fellow mortal</sup> <sup>earnestly: or, in his prayer</sup>
And<S>2532</S> he prayed<S>4336</S> again<S>3825</S>, and<S>2532</S> the heaven<S>3772</S> gave<S>1325</S> rain<S>5205</S>, and<S>2532</S> the earth<S>1093</S> brought forth<S>985</S> her<S>846</S> fruit<S>2590</S>.
Brethren<S>80</S>, if<S>1437</S> any<S>5100</S> of<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S> do err<S>4105</S> from<S>575</S> the truth<S>225</S>, and<S>2532</S> one<S>5100</S> convert<S>1994</S> him<S>846</S>;
Let<S>1097</S> him<S>846</S> know<S>1097</S>, that<S>3754</S> he which converteth<S>1994</S> the sinner<S>268</S> from<S>1537</S> the error<S>4106</S> of his<S>846</S> way<S>3598</S> shall save<S>4982</S> a soul<S>5590</S> from<S>1537</S> death<S>2288</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall hide<S>2572</S> a multitude<S>4128</S> of sins<S>266</S>.
